credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
title: Textile
medium: Silk and metal.  Plain compound cloth.
description: Deep red ground with pattern of large-scale ogive enclosing a central stylized rosette.  Pattern produced by extra wefts of silver thread (flat metal strips) shot through the surface--when not needed for design pass to reverse of fabric--results in a damask-like effect.
name: Textile
